title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars love the fit
items.body: this is so cute and comfortable, i love the fit and the style it gives. perfect for the fall. Read more
items.author: D.K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING QUALITY!!!!
items.body: This Elfric Eden Halfway Zip Up Sweater is so so nice!!! mI love that it can be dressed up or dressed down!!!! The quality is INCREDIBLE!!! I got it for my daughter who LOVES anything “EKFRIC!!!” lol! The sizing ran perfectly according to the size chart in the description. It’s going to be soooo nice for when the weather starts to get a little more cooler because this sweater definitely has a nice weight to it, you can tell just from the feel that this is going to definitely keep you warm!!!! This one is a win!!! It’s so soft & comfy & it’s going to keep you warm especially w/the zip up part the goes to the top of the neck right under the chin….this is a YES - ALL DAY EVERY DAY for Us!!! 5 out 5….EASY!!! Read more
items.author: CHARMAINE..."ThaLovely1"

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Brand, Can’t Go Wrong
items.body: My teenage daughter loves this brand. I have bought a few items from Aelfric Eden and it is always quality. They are consistent with being the on-trend oversize look so if you prefer a more fitted look size down. In fact, I would size down regardless because we sized down to a small (my daughter and I are both medium) and it’s still oversized. The photos are me in the sweater but as soon as pics were done, my daughter snatched it out of my hands to wear to school the next day! This particular sweater has a great texture to it, it’s also so soft and cozy, with a heavy weight, perfect for winter. I love the deep red color, it gives it a vintage classy look while still standing out. Read more
items.author: ARS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Quarter Zip, Thick and Oversized
items.body: This brand is such high quality you can't go wrong. It looks like it would be itchy but it's soft and warm. It is very thick and very oversized. It's definitely a street wear preppy kind of look, if you can pull it off it's an awesome sweater. Zipper is very smooth and it washed and dried really well. Read more
items.author: yb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aelfric Eden
items.body: My daughter had to have this because one of the Kalogeras sisters has it in blue and she loves this brand. She says it’s a little itchy. It actually reminds me of something my mother wore in the 90s.Like a wool quarter zip style. It fit her more like a dress. We ordered a medium and everything from this brand is oversized so she really could’ve done a small. It’ll be cute with leggings and Birks in the fall. Kind of preppy. The quality is great. We’ve loved the quality from this brand. It’s really consistent. Read more
items.author: Lavender Sage

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality. High fashion street wear.
items.body: Very impressed by the weight and quality of this 1/4 zip sweater. Looks and feels high-end without the high price tag. Provides warmth similar to wool without the uncomfortable itch. Perfect for Michigan fall/winter months. The zipper glides smoothly. No loose threads. Fits true to size. High fashion streetwear for young adults made from high quality durable materials that will last the test of time. Machine wash cold (inside out) tumble dry low. Read more
items.author: Daniel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality sweater
items.body: My daughter really likes this brand so I got this quarter zip sweater for her and she loves it. The material is nice and soft so it’s super comfortable to wear (fabric is 100% Acrylic). It’s really nice quality, which I have noticed about all of their clothes. As for fit, she’s tiny but I got her the medium as she likes the oversized look and I would say it fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Customer Review

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 stars out of 5
items.body: My favorite things combined. Aelfric Eden and quarter zips. Perfect combo. It’s thick. It’s great quality. Zipper is smooth like butter. And I can see myself living in this once the weather gets cool. Read more
items.author: WooToTheYoung

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
